physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#596 Old Katz Grocery, Denver c 1913 Moe Katz's birthplace, 945 W. Walnut St." Handwritten on back of photograph: "Moe Katz's birthplace, 945 W. Walnut Street as it looked c 1913." On original envelope: "#596 Old Katz Grocery, Denver c 1913. Moe Katz's birthplace, 945 W. Walnut St."

mods.abstract: Katz Grocery, birthplace of Moe Katz, 945 Walnut Street in Denver, Colorado. Moses (Moe) Katz was born in 1899 and founded the Chemical Sales Company with H. Fine in 1927.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
